tool_description: Scrape websites for data using a real browser & proxies.  Accepts Javascript (JS) and more.
name: Web & Browser Scraping
title: Web & Browser Scraping

api_list.name: Scrape Web - Premium Proxy
api_list.description: Scrape a single URL and return HTML output.  Uses a PREMIUM proxy for better results.

optional_parameters.name: js_scenario
optional_parameters.description: Various JS operations to execute on load.  The example has all the different options.

optional_parameters.name: json_response
optional_parameters.description: Return the response in JSON?

optional_parameters.name: wait
optional_parameters.description: How many milliseconds to wait on initial load before do anything else?

optional_parameters.name: cookies
optional_parameters.description: pass in the following cookies delimited by semi-colon (;)

optional_parameters.name: wait_for
optional_parameters.description: Wait for the css selector element to exist

optional_parameters.name: return_page_source
optional_parameters.description: Return source code of URL

optional_parameters.name: window_width
optional_parameters.description: How wide do you want the scraping browsers window to be?

optional_parameters.name: screenshot_full_page
optional_parameters.description: Do you want a FULL SIZE screenshot returned of the URL?

optional_parameters.name: window_height
optional_parameters.description: How tall do you want the scraping browsers window to be?

optional_parameters.name: screenshot
optional_parameters.description: Do you want a screenshot returned of the URL?
